General.Name: ONEJOON Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Onejoon Co., Ltd. produces and sells high-temperature furnace systems in South Korea. The company offers hybrid, lift bottom, pusher slab, retort, roller hearth, and rotary kilns. It serves customers in various industries, including electric and electronic devices and parts, lithium-ion battery materials, and advanced ceramics. Onejoon Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Suwon-si, South Korea.
